text: Sool (, ) is an administrative region in the east part of Somaliland. Sool is mostly settled by the reer darawiish tribe.Hoehne, Markus Virgil. "„People and Politics along and across the Somaliland-Puntland Border “." Borders and borderlands as resources in the Horn of Africa. London: James Currey (2010): 97-121. It lies between Nugal to the east, and Togdheer in the west. == References == Category:Geography of Somalia
title: Sool, Somalia
